background: Comprehensive zero-trust IAM security framework for a regulated financial services company with multi-account AWS organization. Implements advanced conditional IAM policies using IP restrictions, time-based access, MFA requirements, VPC endpoint enforcement, and regional restrictions. Features granular role hierarchy with separation of duties (developers, operators, administrators), cross-account access controls with external ID validation, automated time-based access expiration, and comprehensive CloudWatch monitoring for all IAM activities. Enforces strict password policies, service-specific least privilege roles, and S3 bucket policies with VPC restrictions to meet financial industry compliance requirements.
